welcome.title: Welcome to Beacons
welcome.description: Beacons helps you communicate effectively with your line manager by organizing and sharing structured information about your needs, preferences, and work progress. Answer prepared questions by category or create custom statements to help them understand how to best support you.
keyBenefits: Share important information with your line manager through structured statements
Track actions related to your statements and monitor progress
Express gratitude for completed actions with custom thank you messages
Easily compile and share all relevant information via email

desktop.title: Desktop Tutorial
desktop.description: Learn how to use Beacons on your desktop or laptop computer.

mobile.title: Mobile Tutorial
mobile.description: Learn how to use Beacons on your mobile device.

features.title: Answering Preset Questions
features.description: Answer organized questions by category to create statements that help your line manager understand your needs and preferences.
steps: Browse questions organized by category (wellbeing, parental, religious, etc.)
Click on a question to open the statement wizard
Follow the guided steps to create your structured statement
Set the privacy level and save your statement

features.title: Creating Custom Statements
features.description: Create your own custom statements when you have something specific to communicate that isn't covered by the preset questions.
steps: Click 'Create Statement' to start
Choose a category for your statement (determines available subject options)
Select a subject, verb, and complete your statement
Set privacy level and save your statement

features.title: Managing Actions
features.description: Track actions related to your statements to monitor progress and follow-up activities.
features.details: Actions allow you and your line manager to track specific tasks that need to be completed in relation to your statements. This helps ensure that your needs are being addressed.
steps: Open a statement from your statement list
Click 'Add Action' to create a new action item
Enter the action details and set a due date
Mark actions as complete when finished

features.title: Expressing Gratitude
features.description: Send thank you messages for completed actions to acknowledge support from your line manager.
steps: Find a completed action in your statements list
Click the 'Express Gratitude' option
Write a personalized thank you message
Send the gratitude message via email

features.title: Email Compilation & Sharing
features.description: Compile and share all your public statements with your line manager via email.
steps: Click the 'Share' button on your statements page
Review which statements will be shared (only public ones)
Enter your line manager's email address
Customize the message (optional)
Send your compiled statements

features.title: Privacy Control
features.description: You have full control over which statements are shared with your line manager.
features.details: For each statement, you can choose whether it's private (only visible to you) or public (visible to your line manager). You can change the privacy setting at any time.
